QuestData.Title: They Call Him Lantresor of the Blade
QuestData.Description: The garrison blueprints were taken to the Burning Blade village when the Warsong sacked your caravan. I can't construct this building without those plans.$B$BThere's been talk of a young blademaster who's been exiled from the clan for many years. They call him Lantresor of the Blade.$B$BOur scouts recently saw him return to Hallvalor to challenge the blademaster leadership. Instead, they clapped him in chains.$B$BMaybe he's still alive. Maybe he'll help you recover the blueprints?
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Lantresor of the Blade in Hallvalor.
QuestData.RewardText: Who are you?$B$BDon't you know death by sight, $c?
